sentences.en: Come and sit next to me on the settee.
sentences.cn: 过来跟我一块儿坐在沙发上.

sentences.en: In its deep gloom we sat down side by side on a wicker settee.
sentences.cn: 在苍茫的暮色中我们并排在一张柳条的长靠椅上坐下.

sentences.en: Let us lay the child to sleep on the settee for a while.
sentences.cn: 让我们把这孩子放在长椅上睡一会儿.

sentences.en: She was lying on a settee in the parlor.
sentences.cn: 她躺在“客厅”的一张小长椅上.

sentences.en: She was lying on a small settee in the parlor.
sentences.cn: 她躺在客厅的一张小长椅上.

sentences.en: The old settee will have to go.
The photo of the settee is in a little nook on the side of the staircase.
sentences.cn: 这张靠背沙发的照片是楼梯边上的一个角落。

sentences.en: We bought a three - piece suite consisting of a settee, an armchair coffee table.
sentences.cn: 我们买了一套三件的家具,包括一张长靠椅 、 一张扶手椅及一张矮茶几.

sentences.en: We bought a three - piece suite consisting of settee, an armchair coffee table.
sentences.cn: 买了一套三件的家具,一张长靠椅 、 一张扶手椅及一张矮茶几.

sentences.en: We sat primly at either end of a long settee.
sentences.cn: 我们非常拘谨地坐在长椅的两头。

sentences.en: When Eleanor returned, I was still sitting glumly on the settee.
sentences.cn: 埃莉诺回来的时候，我还闷闷不乐地坐在长沙发上。

sentences.en: You can bed down on the settee.
sentences.cn: 你可以睡在中型沙发上.

trans.tran_en: a long comfortable seat with a back and usually with arms, for more than one person to sit on
